item.title: Python and R Collaboration
item.description: While debate between both programming languages will always exists, it was incredibly interesting to examine how quite similar both R and Python are in achieving the same output. As I’ll discuss later, there are methods for R and Python to communicate with each other, whether it be through python within R, or R within python! For now I want to highlight an example of python’s mirror of R’s dpylr functions within tidyverse.
